title: Blended Learning Program for Strengthening Clinical Anatomy Knowledge

context.prior_knowledge: Basic anatomy and general understanding of healthcare environments
context.additional_context: Program focused on improving job applicability for medical device management/leadership roles

learning_goals: After completing the clinical case-based e-module, over 80% of learners improve their anatomy knowledge test scores by at least 15%.
In practical laboratory sessions, learners accurately perform at least three clinical skills (e.g., ultrasound-guided procedures) using anatomical models.
In project-based assessments, learners analyze real-world work cases to identify and propose improvements for at least two anatomical deficiencies.

resources: Practical Anatomy Models and Medical Equipment Kit

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
